description: The Adafruit Raspberry Pi Finder is an application which finds the IP address of a new Raspberry Pi, updates it, sets up WiFi access and a hostname, and installs Occidentalis, a collection of useful tools.
summary: The Adafruit Raspberry Pi Finder is an application which finds the IP address of a new Raspberry Pi, updates it, sets up WiFi access and a hostname, and installs Occidentalis, a collection of useful tools.
author: Adafruit
